tool_description:
api to calculate the emi. below are the limits for the api.
1. principal - can take value upto 100 million i.e 100,000,000
2. term - can take upto 600 months.
3. interest rate - upto 50%
name: calculateemi
title: calculateemi

api_list.name: getMyEmi
api_list.description:
calculates the EMI based on 3 inputs
1. principal
2. term - duration in months
3.interest rate per annum
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://calculateemi.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "calculateemi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://calculateemi.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "calculateemi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
